title: NuGet packages have incorrect cross-reference versions
body:
The NuGet packages that come out of `build.cmd -pack` incorrectly specify dependencies between versions to a static, incorrect version number `15.1.0-dev`:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3347530/35759786-88b19e26-0841-11e8-997a-ecad2c5a9619.png)

Fortunately, this has already been fixed with https://github.com/NuGet/NuGet.Client/pull/1915 so we just need to update the version of the SDK we're using.
